typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EmpId as short,
		EmpName as string,
		department as short,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> employees
employees pivot(groupBy(department),
	pivotBy(Country),
	Employees = count(EmpId),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: true) ~> Pivot1
